alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 01 at 3:30AM CST until January 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle and areas of dense freezing fog. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze to around one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Douglas County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
